summary: In this rural film drama, an unwed mother, shunned by her conservative community, goes to court to try to salvage her reputation.
cast: Hansi Knoteck|Ellen Frank|Friedrich Kayßler|Theodor Loos|Kurt Fischer-Fehling|Jeanette Bethge|Eduard von Winterstein|Lina Carstens|Fritz Hoopts|Franz Stein|Erich Dunskus|Erwin Klietsch|Hans Meyer-Hanno|Ellen Becker|Anita Düwell|Thea Fischer|Hildegard Hecker|Meta Jäger|Carl Jönsson|Ilse Petri|Klaus Pohl|Maria Seidler|Betty Sedlmayr|Hilde Sessak|Dorothea Thiess|Fanny Schreck|Ilse Trautschold|Erika Raphael|Georg H. Schnell
title: Das Mädchen vom Moorhof
